data.message: Where's my space ship?
Scott Carpenter is looking for you?
he just left earth!
I have a color photo of him taken in his Air Force uniform shortly after his first flight to space Autographed to me
whoa! that is fucking AWESOME
It was given to me by my godfather who was the head Geologist for NASA and my dad's closest friend.
I remember you and your dad talking about Eugene Shoemaker
that is so cool!
Quite the memory Sabri!
well been by the meteor crater 100s of times ...lol.  love that you knew him
Knew him very well. He died in a car accident near  Alice Springs in the Northern Territory, Australia  around sixteen years ago looking for meteorites.
The swamp monster is at your door.
Spending Christmas with you
AWESOME!
I'm getting a spaceship for Christmas along with Buzz Lightyear
Read my comments about your spaceship thing!
Did you see me on the planet?
lol..yes
I was raising veggies there
What are you up to for X-mas
patricks uncle died today so may head out to houston.
will let you know for sure if we go to NM
My number is 505-715-3406 call
will call in morning.  patrick is on phone with relatives.
I leave Sydney tomorrow
I feel fine now though.... but weird.  Anyhow, I'll let you work....
How much will it cost to do a prototype?
(also check out PTCH http://ptch.com/)
$85/hr for a solid iphone developer.  stay away from others that want to charge more.
I don't want anyone but you!
my good friend and author charges this http://www.linkedin.com/pub/stephen-kochan/12/872/652
and hes the IOS expert
ha thanks
need to understand the full scope of your project
gotta run.. ttyl

Cool.  Thanks.  FYI, a group I met with last week in Santa Barbara one of the guys is Brian Fox (did the GNU bash shell!)   Okay... see you for lunch soon - any day this weekend or next week... just let me know.

Hey Ann,
How are you?  Wish i had the time to do the Google hackathon.   we're deep in production on a couple superbowl projects, launching next weekend.   Would love to hear about your progress.  
Lunch soon!
Sabri

Hi Sabri!  Wanted to ask if you know a company called ESRI - GIS software based in Redlands, CA? My husband is considering taking a position with them.  I'm nervous of course, because its so far away... Will likely necessitate a move to at least Downtown LA so he can take the train... :^/
can u meet for lunch next week?
Would love to. Tuesday at noon? Santa Monica?
thurs or Friday in Santa Monica
Thursday at 1 pm works.
Hi love - where are we meeting?  Cafe Gratitude (on Rose) or???
hey Ann, VW client wants to meet tomorrow and friday is booked.  i'm open all next week.  monday?.
I'm in SF next week - back late Wed or early Thursday.... Let me ping you mid week.  If anything urgent you can always call me....
weekend?
I have a brunch on Sat but Sunday I could.  :-)
Hey Sabri!  We didn't confirm this - but I have a ton of last minutes stuff before my trip!  Maybe we could do a drink at around 5 today?
hey Ann, sicker than a dog past two days. probably from all the partying...:)  lets aim for next week. sabri
Feel better Sabri!
Wendy said he passed his exam.
ha.  he hasnt told me yet..
that bugger
Doh!
lol
i'll pretend like i dont know
check ur email...;)
Ok
Happy birthday!
thnx Larry!
I have another idea I need your advice on.

did u research it to make sure it hasnt been done yet?!
what is it sir!

i'm not really sure what to call it.  basically, it's an electronic device for your vehicle, that detects the frequency emitted by sirens, thus alerting the driver to a nearby emergency vehicle.  it's a problem i see all the time, people have no idea there is a police car or ambulance nearby, because they can't hear over their music or the well-insulated car.

DUDE I LOVE THIS IDEA.  BRILLIANT!  
lets build a prototype.
i'll check http://www.adafruit.com  and http://www.sparkfun.com for sound/noise sensors.  be really easy and cheap to build.   maybe even raise cash thru Kickstarter.com!
Cool!

Damn.  There are a few research papers on this already.  Check out this powerpoint
http://www.ece.gatech.edu/academic/courses/ece4007/08fall/ece4007l03/dk2/EMV%20Detector%20PDR.ppt
Dang!  I actually had this idea in 1993 but had no idea how to make it or proceed. Oh well, guess ill keep my day job. Thanks for looking, Sabri.
Have you seen this?  Pretty cool.
yes! my mit cplleague at deutsch worked on this.  i dont see her credited anywhere though.  christine outram
Very cool stuff. Those MIT folks. What will they think of next?
hopefully not laser popcorn!  its a hard problem
A cure for cancer, the common cold, cold fission, and laser popping pop corn. Things that may never be achieved.
lol.  u and wendy survive the vertical walk/scaling of a building?
We did. It was fun. Thanks for your support.
looked like fun!
well that is why im gonna swing by and propose it to the Sera club
if i can get them on board then it get the exposure and as well as help with the projectg

just got through telling a chiristian to go bleep them selfs and quick shoving it down our thoats bout the Gay marrage issue that i support. They forget there is a ariea in he Constution where it says the prsute of Happyness . if it makes the GLBT happy to get married then let them get married .

ya there ?

http://www.rockmelt.com/s/3vBiQh

- Craig

Yeah she told me! Thanks. How are you?
fine got my new android phone and loving it. when you going back to code for them?
ya mom is back state side . Peace

hey pal
how you doing today ?
well its Pride weekend this weekend and i m going

take look at this ... http://www.slate.com/blogs/bad_astronomy/2012/12/25/shock_wave_in_space_a_massive_star_plows_through_material_between_stars.html
WE HAVE WON PROP 8 IS DEAD MY FRIEND YEA
OH AND DOMA AS WELL
on this day Sabri what ever happened to Peace on earth and good will towards man on Black Friday
funny

Sergio! sorry in responding so late.  i'm very familiar with Time Travel theory, ie according to the equations if  I shot someone with a gun and the bullet travelled faster than the speed of light, it would have hit the person before it left my gun.  weird science huh?!  You've probably heard of Tachyons, which theortically gets emitted in the form of radiation if somone is travelling faster than the speed of light, ie they are going backwards in time.  http://www.faqs.org/faqs/astronomy/faq/part4/section-12.html

Hey man! No worries. This concept I'm working on is sort of more theoretical, exploring those paradoxes and possibilities when dealing with split timelines. Maybe we could do a lunch and I could run it by you? Would be good to catch up too!

Hey Sabri! How goes it? Saw your post about openings at your work. This is a little outside the scope of what was on the list but I thought I'd ask if you guys ever need anyone in the realm of motion graphics and title/logo design or even just straight up commercial directing?

Sergio! send me your resume and i'll forward to the commercial division.   how are you.  last i heard you took a last minute wild trip to Boston....for a historical reason...of course!   maybe meet for lunch here as well.  Were in playa vista.   let me know.
Sabri

Thanks man! Things are good here. Yes that last minute trip to Boston was a magical experience. Such an amazing thing to be able to see in person.

Just plugging away here at personal projects and I'm also freelancing. I've been doing a lot of title design, editorial work and some VFX. I'm attaching my CV here. Also, my website thedonnybrook.com has links and embedded video to my most recent projects (in the "film" section) as well as both VFX and Title Design reels (in the "reels" section). Let me know if you need anything else and thanks so much for forwarding these along!

Lunch would be great! I'd be happy to come down your way. Gimme a buzz when you get the chance and we can figure out a good time. 310-251-1518

Hey Sabri! Hope all is well. Just checking to see if my CV came through ok. Let me know if you still want to grab lunch. If things are too crazy with the holidays no worries. We can wait till the new year.

hey sergio.   we got it just that everyone has been busy with a couple superbowl commercials and last nights holiday events.  I'm not in office today but will follow up on monday, including a time to meet for lunch!  talk soon, Sabri
Hey Sabri! No worries just wanted to make sure it came through ok. Had some trouble sending attachments through FB before. Saw your posts on the pitch fest. Hope it was productive!
If it's easier feel free and give me a buzz.  My number is 310-251-1518

oh wow.  this is way cool.  i'm telling you this is the future/now!
hows your research going?
i am going to open my own mobile development shop soon.. i will back it with a vc firm
shit is gonna get serious on 14
my clean energy company green wavelength has been selected to pitch in the above competition.  not prepared though.
let me know if u need help
with presentation and graphics whatever
definitely
u know i m the master of that
there is no other at your level of excellence
wow.  Deutsch would really benefit from this.
do you wanna meet me 11:30 on friday at playa vista?
`can we do thursday or monday at 11:30?
i m gonna be in the google studio on friday so thats when i can come down to westside! i m getting the google glass!!!

hey tolga, i tried getting out of the lunch meeting with a vc today but she's from east coast and today is the only time she could meet.  I can meet you for lunch near your offices next week except for tuesday.
lets do it next week! anytime you want!
wednesday?
perfect
Lets do this together with deutsche! Lets get a funding for this!!!
can i share with my boss Trevor?
do u want me to sign an NDA
just want to make sure u r protected
yes i can send u an nda
i trust you tho..
hope you are well!
Nice to hear from you Sabri...It would be wonderful to see you on your vist.  Of course Hulya raves about you as well. Hope all is well with you. George
Sabri, Hulya told me to send you pics of the kids.  I will send some later.
yes! how r u?

hello
I can leave work at noon'ish and come to get u in the marina, then we can drive to rb. Will that work?
sure if the weather is fine
i can park again in same place
The weather should be fine I hope
ok let me know
Ok. I'm listening to the weather report

Is this your lens?  

http://www.amazon.com/Canon-18-55mm-3-5-5-6-Digital-Cameras/dp/B000R96FP8  

If not let me know which it is.

Good morning!

What time did we say we are meeting? I forgot
I'm in!
I'm doing great. It has been forever. Live in Colorado. I get to Vegas a few times a year to visit family. No it is Roseann but friends call me Rosie.
Happy Thanksgiving. Hope you are enjoying your day with your family and friends.
Happy Thanksgiving to you to Rosie!  Would love to catch up with you one day.  We do make it out to Vegas every so often.   maybe for Christmas!   All the best.  love Sabri
That would be great. Boys and I will be heading back to Denver on Saturday.
So happy you had a nice visit with your family. Are you back in Cali already?
Well, if you come back, you had better let me know.  I would LOVE to see you guys again!!!
definitely

G'Nite.  Take care and see you Monday. You BETTER be asleep when I get out of church tomorrow or I will be on my way to LA to kick your butt!!!

hey ira been crazy visiting with family and havent had time to see friends.  ill be back in may so would luv to see u then. headed back to LA tomorrow.  happy mew year stud!

Hey, that's OK!!! I hope you all had a BLAST with your family!!! PLEASE have a safe trip and maybe I can see you guys in May (if Im not busy with clinicals). Hope you all enjoyed your time back home.  Take care!!
Oh, Happy New Year as well!!!
hey Ira so sorry about the news..know there is an awesome support structure.  let me know if there is anything i can do to help

Buddy, you are doing just what I was hoping you could do.  Just being an AWESOME friend, buddy!!! I miss you IMMENSLY and hope all is well in your corner of the world!!!!  If I get down and need a kick in the ass, I will hit you up!! ;)  You are simply the BEST!!!

HEY, are you in SFe?  You BETTER at least call or txt before you guys go back.  I MEAN IT!!!
505-948-3910
hows the baby?!
Perfect of course. Napping in my arms now. You know, tiring morning of eating, trying to roll and laughing. How are you?
She's BEAUTIFUL!

Curtis,
How have you been?
I have to admit  i caught the software development bug from you back in the day.  left aerospace to make billions in the the dotcom industry and of course that never happened...lol.  but i did pretty well.   Started my own clean energy company which is making me poor again cause its hardware and not software.  so consulting on the side with an ad agency building software applications.  I make it to new mexico about twice a year so will definitely let you know.  would be great to see u and your family and the HOTTEST car ever! love the camaro.  
I had to lose the hummer h2 since starting my own clean energy company..lol
hows the wife and kid(s)?
ttyl
Sabri

Hey Curt,
Do you know what happened to Ed Nielsen?  I just saw his father's post memorializing him.   Such a tragedy.  He was so young.  
Sabri

Sabri:

I am totally bummed!

He had a massive stroke yesterday with no brain function.  His family took him off life support today.

He's three years younger than me.  We share the same birthday, Aug 9th.

All the more reason to "live for the day" and make reconciliation with God at all times.

I'm really sad.

Curt
Oh that sucks I'm so sorry! We have had a few flu cancellations actually. Get well and thanks for letting me know!
Happy Birthday Future Academy Award Winner!
hehe, thanks Sabri!!

I slept lol!  

We had such an wonderful time at your engagement party.   Ang is a movie star! 

Shannon Gans visited with me at Deutsch and she is awesome.  I'm going to stop by her place today or tomorrow to check out some of their projects.   

How are you doing?  We have a new head of Digital at Deutsch and he has me focused on tablet, ie iPad & Samsung Galaxy android based, development.  really wants me to push the edge.  I'd tap your talents but they made it clear they will own all intellectual capitol.  

what else is going on?
s

Hey Sabri!  Thanks for coming to our engagement party!  You always lighten things up!  Everyone commented that you had a "good energy" about you!
As for me, I'm still burning my life away at Panasonic.  It's a pretty frustrating environment.  I work on my own stuff at night, but I rarely have much energy to get anything done...
Hope all is well and tell Pat I said hi!  I owe you a drink some time for your birthday!
Cheers!
Chuck

Hey Sabri!  Thanks for coming to our engagement party!  You always lighten things up!  Everyone commented that you had a "good energy" about you!
As for me, I'm still burning my life away at Panasonic.  It's a pretty frustrating environment.  I work on my own stuff at night, but I rarely have much energy to get anything done...
Hope all is well and tell Pat I said hi!  I owe you a drink some time for your birthday!
Cheers!
Chuck

Sabri!  Hey man, I'm at Neato, now.  I think this was a good move for me.  Deutsch might have been a stretch.  I've always wanted to mass produce robots and this is the sweet spot!  It's a really great team of guys!  Keep in touch!
Your bud,
Chuck
i just saw ur post. where is neato?!
Newark, CA.  Just north of San Jose
dude I am so bummed as Deutsch dropped the ball on u
as long as ur happy

I think that I'll be happy here.  It's Silicon Valley!  Who would of thought that a Florida back woods son of an Episcopalian preacher would be building cutting edge consumer robots in Silicon Valley?!!!  Geek paradise!  Robots are everywhere in this place!
HA! I'm moving up tomorrow!
Hard to beat all the fun you're having at Deutsch though!
I don't know.  I bet you'll be going to some stellar VC parties
Hopefully after Neato goes public and it sells 10million units!!!
woot!

http://www.neatorobotics.com
tell them to make it work on mobile!
Will be even better.  I can't talk about it, but wait and see.  Neato just got another round of funding, so they're stepping up the product to bury Roomba.
